title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Aug 24 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Aug 24 2022
description:
Biden rolls out the Midterm Bribe: Student Loan Forgiveness. How many votes can Democrats buy with an unconstitutional executive order? Clay says, "I would be stunned beyond belief if the Supreme Court doesn't strike this down." Pelosi: "People think that the president of the United States has the power for [student loan] debt forgiveness. He does not." Elizabeth Warren laughs at you fools who saved for college or repaid your student loans. Why liberals never demand colleges and universities charge less. Callers weigh in on Biden's student loan debt transference. Buck says one of the wisest comments he ever heard is, "A debt is never forgiven. It's transferred from one entity to another."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Biden rolls out the Midterm Bribe: Student Loan Forgiveness. How many votes can Democrats buy with an unconstitutional executive order? Clay says, "I would be stunned beyond belief if the Supreme Court doesn't strike this down." Pelosi: "People think that the president of the United States has the power for [student loan] debt forgiveness. He does not." Elizabeth Warren laughs at you fools who saved for college or repaid your student loans. Why liberals never demand colleges and universities charge less. Callers weigh in on Biden's student loan debt transference. Buck says one of the wisest comments he ever heard is, "A debt is never forgiven. It's transferred from one entity to another."
